mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.tag_category AS "tagCategory.id", c.name AS "tagCategory.name", a.expression AS "expression", a.type AS "type", a.measure_id AS "measure.id", m.name AS "measure.name", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.rule_of_judgment AS "ruleOfJudgment", a.tag_key AS "tagKey"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_tag_category c ON c.id = a.tag_category LEFT JOIN mod_measure m ON m.id = a.measure_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_tag( id, name, tag_category, expression, type, measure_id, rule_of_judgment, tag_key, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{tagCategory.id}, #{expression}, #{type}, #{measure.id}, #{ruleOfJudgment}, #{tagKey}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_tag SET name = #{name}, tag_category=#{tagCategory.id}, expression = #{expression}, type = #{type}, measure_id=#{measure.id}, rule_of_judgment=#{ruleOfJudgment}, tag_key=#{tagKey}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
